channel.title: Getting Started on AIDE-QC
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on AIDE-QC

item.title: Build Everything from Source
item.description: Table of Contents Install Dependencies XACC and QCOR on Ubuntu XACC and QCOR on Mac OS X and Linux x86_64 with Homebrew Build the LLVM Clang SyntaxHandler Fork For the adventurous out there, or if your system does not support the above prebuilt binary instructions, you can build the AIDE-QC components from source. Install Dependencies Run the package installer commands for your system to get all requisite dependencies:
